sentence.Network_en: Not long after the wedding, the wife began to mistreat her stepdaughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚礼过后不久, 这位太太就开始虐待她的继女.

sentence.Network_en: Henry was accused of abusing his stepdaughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 亨利被指控虐待他的继女.

sentence.Network_en: I warned her against wronging her stepdaughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 我警告她不要虐待她的继女.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 家庭成员关系英文翻译_百度知道 ... stepson 继子 stepdaughter 继女 stepbrother 异父(母)之兄弟.

entry.def: Someone's step-daughter is a daughter that was born to their husband or wife during a previous relationship.

means.word_mean: 1. a daughter of your spouse by a former marriage
